sentences.sContent: He wants a stapler, but she have not get one.
sentences.sContent_eng: He wants a stapler, but she have not get one.
sentences.sCn: 他想要一个订书机， 但她没有。

sentences.sContent: A "stapler" is a small object that pushes a small piece of metal through pieces of paper to hold them together.
sentences.sContent_eng: A "stapler" is a small object that pushes a small piece of metal through pieces of paper to hold them together.
sentences.sCn: “订书机”是一种能将一小块金属穿过一沓纸把它们放在一起的小物体。

sentences.sContent: "If Joanne cracks her gum one more time, I swear I'm going to send my stapler sailing into her cubicle, " you think to yourself.
sentences.sContent_eng: "If Joanne cracks her gum one more time, I swear I'm going to send my stapler sailing into her cubicle, " you think to yourself.
sentences.sCn: 你在心里对自己说“如果下次乔安娜再嚼口香糖的话，我发誓一定冲过去将订书机甩到她位置上。

synos.tran: [轻]订书机；主要商品批发商；把羊毛分级的人

remMethod.val: staple(订书钉； 主要产品) + r → 订书机

words.tran: 主要的，大宗生产的；常用的；纺织纤维的

trans.tranOther: a tool used for putting staples into paper
